{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = XTM 21-W angle.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = WatchGuard Firebox XTM 2 Series (21-W) |caption2 = Wireless Internet Firewall with VPN |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = WatchGuard |model = Firebox Edge XTM 21 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -W (XP3E6W) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 31 December 2020 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/WatchGuard_Firebox_Edge_XTM_21-W |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = security appliance, wireless router, |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q6G-XP3E6W |icid = 4657A-XP3E6W |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = YM110A-1.6mm <!-- YJ720A-1.0, TM110C-1.1mm + YJ700A-1.0 (FCC) --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP435; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 667 <!-- 400 / 533 / 667 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV800CTTC-70G; |flash1size = 1 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2chip = Samsung;K9F2G08U0B-PCB0; |flash2size = 256 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = EtronTech;EM68B16CWPA-25H; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E6060;88E6060-ACJ1; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366SR; |wan_ports = 3 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:90:7F |oui = 00:90:7F
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;2.04;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.35.12;;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON1
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, heatsink, |addchip = 2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS9435A;;2;,,, Dual Operational Amplifier;Texas Instruments;LM358;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-OR Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC32A;;1;,,, Positive Edge-triggered 3-State Octal D-type Flip-Flop;NXP;74HC374N;;1;,,, 800ma Low Dropout Linear Regulator;National Semiconductor;LM1117;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 10.0.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = readwrite |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = EoL |eoldate = 06/30/2017 |fccapprovdate = 10/02/2009 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00383FHA4 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SerComm YJ720A-1.0 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9160; |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9106; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
